Instructions: Each trial begins with a 2-second auditory or visual stimulus. After the stimulus, you will have 4 seconds to vividly imagine what you just perceived. Then, report the vividness of your mental imagery on a scale from 1 (not vivid at all) to 5 (very vivid). Press the spacebar to begin when you are ready. Vividness rating: Please input a number from 1 to 5.
SubjectArtefactDescription: Participants were instructed to minimize movements and eye blinks. Behavior was monitored during the session.
